findings.title: Admin/Owner Privileges can be misused
findings.description: The admin/owner of Ustx smart contracts has various privileges over the smart contracts, which can be misused either intentionally or unintentionally.

findings.title: Unnecessary initialization to zero value
findings.description: In the constructor() of the AdminRole contract in AdminRole.sol, the _numAdmins state variable is initialized to 0, which is unnecessary.

findings.title: Contract code size exceeds 24576 bytes
findings.description: The UstxDEX smart contractâ€™s code size exceeds 24576 bytes (24 KB), which can make it non-deployable on testnet/mainnet without compiler optimization.
